about_the_game:
Bare Knuckle Sandwich is a 2D boxing game featuring side-scrolling exploration and a character driven narrative. Follow Gunner as he joins an underground bare-knuckle boxing ring looking for something to strive for in a world full of con-artists, grifters, and people just trying to get by. After meeting a new mentor, Gunner begins to find his footing after a rough start to adulthood. However, it's a long way to the top and he'll have to overcome everyone standing in his way to succeed, especially himself.

  • 2D Bare-knuckle boxing
    Enter the ring and fight unique opponents, each with their own fight style and tricks up their sleeves. Fight your way up the ladder of victory and make a name for yourself amongst the best fighters the city has to offer. Master quick reactions, precise dodging, and devastating strikes to send your opponents reeling.
  • Sidescrolling Exploration
    Between fights, explore the city and mingle with the locals. Meet a variety of interesting people and help Gunner make a friend or two. His rise to the top will also attract brutal enemies.
  • Mini-games
    Training to be the best bare-knuckle boxer around takes a lot of time, but it doesn't pay the bills. Perform a variety of side hustles to earn some extra cash. Make sure to save some money to buy info on your next fight.
  • Original Story
    Experience Gunner’s personal journey of early adulthood through hand-crafted dialogue and cutscenes.
  • Soundtrack
    Bare Knuckle Sandwich features music by the artist Torture World setting the atmosphere during exploration, fights, and cutscenes.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild Violence and blood. Brief mentions of sexual activity. Depictions and mention of legal and illegal drug use. Crude language and humor. Cursing. Illegal boxing.
